text: How to hs fetch into current folder and not a subfolder?

hs fetch theme-name-in-portal ../ --overwrite places the content one folder up and “./” and “.” or even blank either throws errors or creates subfolders in my current folder.

I want the fecth to overwrite the contents of the folder i am running the watcher in
Is there a way to turn off the layout tab in the page editor?
